text: Any news on this ?

This component would be amazing as it also includes a preview button for each listed item, and the option to delete the item. For instance, I use it to list line items and since I need to give the client the ability to delete it from a deal UI extension, I have to create a custom component. It would have been great if this component had a delete button for each record.
The Association table component does allow you to remove the associations, it also allow you to preview each record... Are you not seeing these options?
nope :disappointed: this is line items  <@U01QVR44MEY>
i don't see actions

interesting, I assume that's because the actions drop downs are primarily for associations and Line items 1 to 1 with deals so if you removed that association you couldn't get it back without creating a new line item.
maybe they can add an exception like this only for deals to line item association :

Hello Raymes, can you check
1. Account is either Sales or Service enterprise tier
2. You are a super admin
Is the dev server taking a while to spin up for anyone else?
Once it's running it's totally fine, just takes a good 2 minutes to get running
Sits in this state:
Hi <@U01QVR44MEY> :wave:  could you share the output of `hs --version` please ? I want to try to reproduce this on my end
the only way to run things, up to date
I'm not able to reproduce this on my end, everything is starting up fine for me :thinking_face:
Are you experiencing any other network slowness?
None
Upload takes 15 seconds on average
That’s why it’s a little strange that devis running slow
Yeah, that is strange.  What kind of account are you running local dev with?  Is it prod/sandbox/dev sandbox?
Prod
It looks like we released `v5.1.2` yesterday, maybe updating to that might resolve your issue

Hi <@U018962HD47>! Thanks for this great feedback!

Just to double check my understanding: the association table is working well and displaying the data that you need. However, you’d like to add an option to “Delete” the line item from the “Actions” dropdown you see on hover?

I think this would be an excellent use case for extensible actions. We have been investigating adding the ability to customize the actions displayed when hovering over rows. We would support all the actions available through the `CrmAction*` components.

Are there other actions you would like to see in this location? Or other components you would like to similarly customize?

Hello Hugo, file upload is a complex component requiring us to think through some of our architecture. We understand the importance of this but we don't have a timeline to deliver this as of today. I will keep everyone posted.

It'll help to know your use case for it in any case.
